description: A unique identifier for each game.

An integer corresponding to a season of college basketball. CBBD's convention is to use the year in which the championship takes place, so if a game took place in the fall of 2024, the season would be recorded as "2025".
A string identifying the two years that one college basketball season spans, e.g. "20242025".
A string identifying whether the tracked game is a "regular" season game or a "postseason" game.
The start date and time, given in ISO 8601 format in the GMT time zone.
A boolean indicating whether the game time has not yet been scheduled.
A unique identifier for the home team.
The name of the home team.
The name of the home team's conference.
A unique identifier for the away team.
The name of the away team.
The name of the away team's conference.
A boolean indicating that the game took place in a neutral site.
A boolean indicating that the game took place between opponents of the same conference during conference place.
Miscellaneous notes about the game, such as the tournament the game is played under.
The media format that the broadcast is available in. Includes "TV", "Streaming", "Radio", "PPV", and "Mobile".
The name of the broadcasting entity carrying the game.
